archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Samenwerkingssysteem
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Een systeem dat het creeren en delen van gezamenlijke kennis ondersteunt.

properties.value: EDUgroepen (https://www.edugroepen.nl/Pages/default.aspx), Microsoft Sharepoint (http://office.microsoft.com/en-us/sharepoint/), LifeRay Social Office (http://www.liferay.com/products/liferay-social-office), Sakai CLE for Project Collaboration (http://www.sakaiproject.org/project-collaboration), BlackBoard Collaborate (http://www.blackboard.com/Platforms/Collaborate/Overview.aspx), WikiXL (http://www.wikixl.nl)
